entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Mackenzie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:08 PM PST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mackenzie Airport 02:49 AM PST Thursday 16 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.9°C

Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 93 %

Dewpoint: -2.9°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Clearing in the evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 3 in the evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 15 February 2023
